content: inspired by hollow knight grub crochet pattern free crochet pattern @creationsrealized hey there crafter i m anna the gal behind creations realized and i m happy you re here get ready to crochet the cutest collectible creature from your favorite game hollow knight please read through the directions and have fun and a quick note about copyright this crochet pattern is inspired by the grub character from hollow knight hollow knight and its characters are the property of team cherry the pattern instructions and images are © creations realized 2025 you are welcome to use adapt or modify this pattern creativity is encouraged but please credit me creations realized as the pattern designer please do not copy share or claim this pattern as your own in any form for any questions about copyright or fan content feel free to reach out to me or reference team cherry s fan guidelines thank you so much for your support with no further ado happy realizing @creationsrealized 2 materials finished size 3 75 mm f crochet hook or preferred weight 4 yarn* in the grub ◦ main green *each color should measures ◦ secondary green use less than 50g about 6 3/4 of yarn ◦ cream inches tall ◦ black and weighs polyester fiber fill for stuffing around 50 scissors grams in tapestry needle for sewing total a stitch marker to mark the first stitch of each round if desired abbreviations round s round s chain s chain s st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch fsc foundation single_crochet optional single_crochet single_crochet increase increase two single crochets made in the space of one stitch decrease decrease single_crochet made across two stitches sc4tog single_crochet four together single_crochet made across four stitches … repeat what is inside the parentheses the indicated number of times … the number of stitches at the end of each round @creationsrealized 3 head & body with the main green yarn round 1 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring 6 round 2 6 increase 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 rnds 5-8 24 single_crochet 24 round 9 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 round 10 4 single_crochet decrease x 3 15 begin stuffing the head round 11 7 increase 8 single_crochet 22 round 12 single_crochet increase x 7 8 single_crochet 29 round 13 29 single_crochet 29 round 14 single_crochet decrease x 7 8 single_crochet 22 round 15 7 decrease 8 single_crochet 15 rnds 16-20 repeat rnds 11-15 continue stuffing the body round 21 single_crochet 7 increase 7 single_crochet 22 round 22 single_crochet single_crochet increase x 7 7 single_crochet 29 round 23 23 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 27 finish stuffing the body round 24 single_crochet single_crochet decrease x 7 single_crochet 2 decrease 18 fasten_off leaving a long round 25 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 yarn tail thread your round 26 single_crochet decrease 6 increase decrease single_crochet 16 tapestry needle with the yarn round 27 decrease 5 single_crochet 2 increase 5 single_crochet decrease tail
